nodes.text: Doctor Rispi Lacendad was a family physician. He ran a clinic in Coruscant's CoCo District, with individuals of the Chadra-Fan species making up almost half of his clientele. After a study by Rhire Medical Academy found Chadra-Fan—among other species—to be at risk of disease from air pollution, Rhine commented to HoloNet News on the matter, noting that he encouraged his Chadra-Fan patients to don breathmasks when outdoors.
